SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_reppolicy_claim_count SET contract_id = :contract_id, product_code = :product_code, cert_duration = :cert_duration, converage_type_id = :converage_type_id, replacement_policy_claim_count = :replacement_policy_claim_count, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE reppolicy_claim_count_id = :reppolicy_claim_count_id

SQL.LOAD_COVERAGE_TYPE_BY_DEALER: select distinct LI.list_item_id id, translation description, code from ( select DISTINCT COVERAGE_TYPE_ID from elp_product_code pc inner join elp_item i on pc.product_code_id = i.product_code_id inner join elp_coverage c on c.item_id = i.item_id where pc.dealer_id = :dealer_id ) c inner join elp_list_item li on c.coverage_type_id = li.list_item_id inner join elp_dict_item_translation trans on li.dict_item_id = trans.dict_item_id where trans.language_id = :language_id order by upper(description)
SQL.LOAD_AVAILABLE_CERT_DURATION_BY_DEALER: select DISTINCT CERTIFICATE_DURATION from elp_product_code pc inner join elp_item i on pc.product_code_id = i.product_code_id inner join elp_coverage c on c.item_id = i.item_id where pc.dealer_id = :dealer_id
